List packages that fgeo imports and suggests.

List packages that fgeo imports and suggests.

fgeo_packages(include_self = TRUE, section = c("Imports", "Suggests"))

fgeo_imports(include_self = TRUE)

fgeo_suggests()

Arguments

include_self

Include fgeo in the list?
section

Either "Imports" or "Suggests".

Examples

fgeo_packages(TRUE, "Imports")
#>  [1] "bciex"           "cli"             "crayon"          "fgeo.abundance" 
#>  [5] "fgeo.demography" "fgeo.map"        "fgeo.tool"       "purrr"          
#>  [9] "remotes"         "rstudioapi"      "fgeo.habitat"    "fgeo"           
# Same
fgeo_imports()
#>  [1] "bciex"           "cli"             "crayon"          "fgeo.abundance" 
#>  [5] "fgeo.demography" "fgeo.map"        "fgeo.tool"       "purrr"          
#>  [9] "remotes"         "rstudioapi"      "fgeo.habitat"    "fgeo"           

fgeo_suggests()
#> [1] "knitr"     "rmarkdown" "testthat"

Contents

  • Examples
